en.registered:
This is a message from the Red Cross.

We have received your application for support.

You will receive another SMS message with more information within 1 week.
en.whatsappPayment:
This is a message from the Red Cross.

Your €{{1}} Albert Heijn supermarket voucher is ready to be sent.

Please reply “yes” to this message in order to receive:
1. This week's voucher.
2. Any previous vouchers you haven't received yet.
en.whatsappVoucher:
This is a message from the Red Cross.

With this message you received 2 pictures.
One is the Albert Heijn supermarket voucher (cadeaukaart) with the barcode.
The other is an explanation of how you can use the voucher to pay in Albert Heijn.

 The value of this voucher is €{{1}}.
You can spend the voucher at any Albert Heijn supermarket in the Netherlands.

You don’t have to spend everything at once. So keep this voucher in your phone and re-use it until the amount is finished.

You will receive a €{{1}} Albert Heijn voucher every week on Tuesday until 31 May 2021 the latest.

Do you have questions? Send us a message on WhatsApp: https://wa.me/31600000000
en.whatsappReply: This is an automated message, for questions please contact the Red Cross Helpdesk on WhatsApp: +31600000000

label.en:
Please share the phone number that you can receive an SMS on. We will use this phone number to inform you on the aid program.

It should look like: +31 6 00 00 00 00
